message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 3-c-1, translated into en
data: The Observatory of Human Resources for Health of Mozambique (ORHS), played a major role in improving the HRH information system (eSIPSaúde), by promoting the use of information technologies for data analysis and in supporting the technicians of the DRH at the country level, in the use of tools (Excel), as well as in the creation of competence in the analysis of data quality. SIP-Saúde helps to improve data quality, analyze, validate and prepare reports.
